page.title: 16Children's Game-Laughton
page.content: Elastics is a very simple game and is usually played outside by any number of people. It is a game played with a long piece of elastic with the ends tied together. Two people then get into the elasic loop and stretch it until it becomes quite tight. The other players then take it in turns to jump either into the loop or onto the elastic. There are three main stages in the game, which are ankles, knees and thighs. First you put it round your ankles and then players jump to rhymes. We follow this throughout the game, moving the elastic up our body. We enjoy this game and it gives us something to do at playtimes. At playtime, our school yard is full of people playing elastics. It is the girls' favourite game in our school. Another name for the game is French Skipping.
